channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
Well what i am trying to do is get all my shops from my other server on to this one without messing anything up... ive moved the shop area... but when i TRY to get the shops onto the server... it came up with 100 errors ^.^ soo.... if someone could help, that would be much appreciated.
- Thanks, Gh0st Jr

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @CripScape_Jeff CripScape Jeff
item.description:
@CripScape_Jeff wrote:

delete them from old shops.cfg and then add the shops you want in there then go into client.java and make npcs respond to the shop number just simply search in client.java " wanneshop "

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I’ll show you how, if you give me your soul.

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @fallen455 fallen455
item.description:
@fallen455 wrote:

just make a brand new npc bla bla bla then go to shop cgf. and put all it in there should work but u need to make a new npc if u want a brand new shop otherwize just change some things on ur shop char. hope i helped a lil

Read full topic

item.description:
@Gh0st_Jr wrote:

well… would i have to like see which NPCs aren’t being used and then like only add the ones that aren’t being used?

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

Like shops the config file? or the coordinates of npcs that host shops… because if you add some of the shops from one server onto the other there may already be an npc with a shop and it’s like you’re assigning two shops to one NPC…

Read full topic
